caseTitle: Junaid Wazir v. Superintendent of Police, PRU/Dolphin Police, Lahore and another
tagline: Discussion: (1) Doctrine of ex debito justitiae. (2) Right of representation is provided under Section 21 of Punjab Civil Servants Act, 1974 against discharge from service under Rule 12.21 of Police Rules, 1934. (3) Any adverse decision on representation can be challenged under Section 4 of the Punjab Service Tribunals Act, 1974.
